---
title: "4. Open Science in the project lifecycle - share & disseminate "
date: today
---

::: {.callout-tip}
### Learning Objectives

By the end of this session, learners will be able to:

- Define the different types of Open Access publishing options and their benefits and 
limitations  
- Evaluate the sensitivity of research outputs and whether they can be made openly available,
and describe available options to publish sensitive data  


:::
